n02085620-Chihuahua.health: Prone to dental issues, hypoglycemia, and patellar luxation. Regular dental care, small frequent meals, and joint support are essential.

n02113799-standard_poodle.health: Standard Poodles are generally healthy but are prone to hip dysplasia, hypothyroidism, and bloat. Regular check-ups and exercise are crucial for their health.

n02115913-dhole.health: Dholes may suffer from hip dysplasia, heart conditions, and parasitic infections. Regular health check-ups and vaccinations are essential.
